```{r}
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}
hom_data <- 
  readr::read_csv("../data/homicide-data.csv")
```

```{r}
# choose top homicide city
top_hom_city <- hom_data %>%
  dplyr::group_by(city) %>%
  dplyr::count() %>%
  dplyr::arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  dplyr::ungroup()
```
